mapper.insert: insert into real_estate (id, owner_name, road_address, parcel_address, postcode, building_name, detail_address, supply_area, exclusive_area, purchase_date, purchase_price, kb_market_price, tech_market_price, public_market_price, rental_type, deposit, monthly_rent, housing_rental_business_yn, housing_rental_type, housing_rental_start_dt, housing_rental_duty_end_dt, created_by, created_dt, modified_by, modified_dt) values (#{id}, #{ownerName}, #{roadAddress}, #{parcelAddress}, #{postcode}, #{buildingName}, #{detailAddress}, #{supplyArea}, #{exclusiveArea}, #{purchaseDate}, #{purchasePrice}, #{kbMarketPrice}, #{techMarketPrice}, #{publicMarketPrice}, #{rentalType}, #{deposit}, #{monthlyRent}, #{housingRentalBusinessYn}, #{housingRentalType}, #{housingRentalStartDt}, #{housingRentalDutyEndDt}, #{createdBy}, current_timestamp, #{modifiedBy}, current_timestamp)
